column1: Whats the difference between a hippo and a zippo? ones heavy and the other is a little lighter...
column3: The term light can refer to something that does not weigh much.
column4: The bag was so light that I could carry it with one finger.
column5: The light from the lamp illuminated the entire room.

column1: 2. **Joke**: Why did the toilet paper roll down the hill? to get to the bottom.
- bottom can refer to the lowest part and also to refer to a rear end.
Why did the toilet paper roll down the hill? to get to the bottom.
column3: The bottom of the hill was covered in grass.
column4: He fell and landed on his bottom.

column1: 3. **Joke**: I tried wrapping all the presents this year but I just dont have the gift.
- gift can refer to a present and also a special talent or ability.
I tried wrapping all the presents this year but I just dont have the gift.
column3: A birthday gift was neatly wrapped in colorful paper.
column4: She has the gift of giving excellent advice.

column1: If you want more specific examples or clarity on specific jokes, feel free to ask!
